articles.title: Alzheimer’s symptoms: Signs in your driving may indicate early stages of condition - Express
articles.description: ALZHEIMER'S disease is the most common cause of dementia in the UK, but there's currently no cure. Spotting the condition early can help a person understand their diagnosis. A recent study revealed early signs in people's driving.
